skullflower.title: Circulus Vitiosus Deus
skullflower.about:
56
Anyone who, like me, has, with some enigmatic desire or other, made an effort for a long time to think profoundly about pessimism and to rescue it from the half-Christian, half-German restrictions and simple-mindedness with which it has most recently appeared in this century, that is, in the form of Schopenhauer's philosophy; anyone who really has, with an Asian and super-Asiatic eye, looked into and down on the most world-denying of all possible ways of thinking - beyond good and evil and no longer as Buddha and Schopenhauer do, under the spell and delusion of morality - such a man has perhaps in the process, without really wanting to do so, opened his eyes for the reverse morality: for the ideal of the most high-spirited, most lively, and most world-affirming human being, who has not only learned to come to terms with and accept what was and is but wants to have what was and is come back for all eternity, calling out insatiably da capo [from the beginning] , not only to himself but to the entire play and spectacle, and not only to a spectacle but basically to the man who needs this particular spectacle and who makes the spectacle necessary, because over and over again he needs himself - and makes himself necessary. How's that? Wouldn't this be circulus vitiosus deus [god as a vicious circle]?
friedrich-nietzsche/beyond-good-and-evil/aphorism-56

skullflower.title: City of Lagoons
skullflower.about:
the hawkwind dream:
i'm backstage, on the periphary of the stage; the band are playing in a cave high in tibet, looking out the cave mouth is like zardoz (also like our ponies field shelter, which is similarly strewn with prayer flags) theres a lot of non musician dancers, laughing light elves, kind of led by nik.
lemmy and dave are a bit scowly about this 'distraction' and the dark grit chords shake like thunder. but blissfully uncaring, nik and his cohort are dancing out of the cave, dancing on air, borne by the wind, clutching the strings of prayer flags that are fluttering out into the void, and i realise, this is IT.

trackinfo.title: Eve's Dream
trackinfo.about:
Taste this, and be henceforth among the Gods
Thy self a Goddess, not to Earth confind,
But somtimes in the Air, as wee, somtimes
Ascend to Heav'n, by merit thine, and see
What life the Gods live there, and such live thou.
So saying, he drew nigh, and to me held,
Even to my mouth of that same fruit held part
Which he had pluckt; the pleasant savourie smell
So quick'nd appetite, that I, methought,
Could not but taste. Forthwith up to the Clouds
With him I flew, and underneath beheld
The Earth outstretcht immense, a prospect wide
And various: wondring at my flight and change
To this high exaltation; suddenly
My Guide was gon, and I, me thought, sunk down,
And fell asleep;
John Milton, Paradise Lost
trackinfo.credits: from Desire for a Holy War, released June 4, 2015

skullflower.title: Foetor
skullflower.about:
aka: Pure: Fetor.
circa 87? some person wanted to release material by Pure, (which was well deceased (84) by then) I obliged with material that I was currently working on, (some of this was definitely on home copied cassettes entitled Sutra (thanks section 25) and sold at rough trade shop, so I could get pocket money to buy flipper, big stick records etc) he then released it as Pure with one of the most boring generic industrial yuck genitalia sleeves ever. in 2006 freak animal re-released it on cd, this time with a pretty photocopy from the time of bellmers doll.
(Bellmer and Battaille being twin beacons in my early, and always, arte)

trackinfo.title: Transformer
trackinfo.about:
cf lou reed, lamont young, and an interest in form, as in seems, semblance, zembla
eg de-form, trans-form and, FORM DESTROYER (pkd) and, FORMLESS (Battaille) ‘formless is not only an adjective… but a term serving to render déclassé the requirement that each thing have its own form… Actually, for academics to be happy would require the universe to take shape. All of philosophy has no other goal… On the other hand, to say that the universe resembles nothing and is nothing but formless is the same as saying that the universe is like a spider or a blob of spit '. not base but liberating

skullflower.title: Haitian Vibrations
skullflower.about:
All is forever in the dance, to apprehend it changes one forever, it occurs in the distraction, the overlapping of two distinct discernable patterns produces a third, oblique pattern: moire, a real hallucination, the key.
this i seek to approximate in music, heaving nearly-riffs are overlaid w/out reference and something I never intended is born. The dance contains small and large gestures, fingertips complete the arm sweep, all radiates from the core.

skullflower.title: Heraldic Devices
skullflower.about:
In these 'age of iron' times, where cruelty hath an anime avatar, and the evil avow that they are at war with 'hate', signs are taken for wonders, and symbols and words are emptied of their powers by overuse. Trust your instincts. Maybe we are the good ones, and the signallers of virtue are evil careerists, getekeepers, vampiric controllers of the discourse.
Fifty years ago Yukio Mishima destroyed his flesh envelope so his spirit could soar in sun and steel, a true sign, a beacon flashing across the ages.
We humbly dedicate these latter-day heraldic mantras to that spirit.

skullflower.title: Jammin' with the Bear
skullflower.artist: The Forger of 3 a.m. Dreams at the Border of the Violet Marsh
skullflower.about:
the scene: the deserted mall at 3am. a boombox and a dying battery powered amp strapped to a shopping cart and a hunched, shrouded figure, swathed, a conical hat with brim, downtilted as the FOARGER picks and plucks and croons, to the ancient harp of canned heats 'parthogenesis', in front, a motley bear-cat SOLEMNLY performs the chams-yig: the thunderbolt step and the 'killing' of the linga (they stab it with their spirit knives...)
the security cameras roll on, recording NOTHING
But in the Lamasery of Shangri-La, on the terraces of Shamballa, ears prick up, tears are shed, and Toasts are raised to the mighty Bear Spirit.
Amen

skullflower.about:
cover: its a bosnian girl who's just been shot, in the early stages of the yugoslavian breakup tit for tat slaughter. I liked its kind of ambiguous wtf, is it ecstatic etc.
the text on the inner is cut ups of my writing that tried to articulate a little the lsd diamond bulllet black sun that surged up my spine and fucked my skull on a wave lashed cornish outcrop in 87 as I gazed at the 'real' sun thru closed lids, my body fused supine into hot mica fleckd granite.
the drawing is by gunther brus, who's aktionist performance was a huge 'fluence on pure. the drawing has that kind of strapped to a rocket, suicide bomber, in the death star vibe. one chance. make sure you use it wisely: LAST SHOT AT HEAVEN!

skullflower.about:
'Military Temples (for coil)'
Skullflower remixed, retouched, and retooled by Black Sunroof!
Stiff Opposition 003
A Symphony of Seven Aires for the Witch Queen: Seventy minutes and Seven seconds
Seven jewels in her Diadem, the great mother; Typhon, Coatlicue, Chaos. All Evil proceeds from the Seven stars, Ursa major, great bear, upright in our sky, the axe, the cleaver, the neither, dividing thigh constellations, and then..., one more..., the (h)eighth, and then; one step more, across the parquet floor, one more star, ninth... twinkling green Siriuss.... where the jungles are, and the deadly nightshade firebirds cry around the ruined military temples, over which black shapes hover, blotting out the sky... the ships are leaving, this time, maybe forever. Before I pass out I see, etched in living crimson fire, runes on the space ships...
physically released in an edition of 41 cdrs (11 deluxe with fetiche) on 16 april 2015

skullflower.title: Possessions Dark Reflection
skullflower.about:
Voltigeurs - Possessions Dark Reflection
Within the realms of a fairly harsh discography, Voltigeurs' Possession is a Harsh One, so it's almost unfair, in a way, to reveal, and release, upon an unsuspecting multiverse, what is known to us, as Possesssion's Dark Reflection.
Issuing from the same time realm of madness /self discovery that Possession charted (west yorks and the reverse of the tree 2010-12), pdr collects the most outre, and 'wrong' pieces, that provided crazed detours, and monstrous outgrowths along the way.
When a set of tracks, an album, leaves the house it also leaves behind 'the others' - the music too 'just another track' or just too 'wonderful in the right mood but unlistenable the next day'. These 'others' should perhaps have been locked in the attic.

skullflower.title: sweet little skunks
skullflower.about:
ghod i might of hymned these little piebald beasts before, BUT this time its personal, what do you think i do w/ the digital pffenigs i manage to syphon offa you b'leivers anyhow??
thats right: animal feed, booster shots, and soon: field rent and hay as we adopt Domino, our spirit animal, sweet little equine atavism...
we should shew a little prudence (and do) but '17 was always supposed to show us the crazed path from here to eternity...(the crooked path is the spine of the great bear, when the cleaver, the opener is raised, it lays, like a breadcrumb trail, up into the firmament.)
so i beg yr indulgence and will play my lil' heart out til my fingers bleed, if you'll toss us a few of them aforementioned pennies, i'll nurture these tatterdemalion halfbreeds and fly the flag for Gondal and Albion while my strength lasts (after that its sirius...) a-fucking-men. mb

skullflower.title: trapdoors and tunnels

Remember: the symbols glyphed on the door, within the fire, gaze at the radiating pent-angle, until you begin to see the door. Cease, then. So as to have it there. Brink. Escape route, lightly camouflaged, waiting through the years.
We are the Demon-in-the-Maze, the thickets, the moon caught within branches, Sirius trapped in glistening hawthorn. The harmonics of dream choirs, strings, brasses are the woven tresses, twigs, thorns: the simple lines you follow all end in the same entanglement: the comb.

skullflower.title: Aries Wolf
skullflower.about:
the A.W. is a creature we encountered on the walk out to the altar on my birthday. A black Ram who is his own wolf. and Ram is the fire mantra, and Aries the firesign. And Loki-Agni the trickster lone wolf of fire, the inner need-fire that is conjured within, like focussing the suns rays with a magnifying glass, then kindled and nurtured inwardly, secretly. Our Sun is in the south.
pluus: free download is also available to anyone buying a t shirt from our newly activated merch section.

skullflower.title: averse path
skullflower.about:
Hymn to Lucifer
His body a bloody-ruby radiant
With noble passion, sun-souled Lucifer
Swept through the dawn colossal, swift aslant
On Eden's imbecile perimeter.
He blessed nonentity with every curse
And spiced with sorrow the dull soul of sense,
Breathed life into the sterile universe,
With Love and Knowledge drove out innocence
The Key of Joy is disobedience.
A.C.
note how 'miltons track' is a mirroir magique reflecttion of 'satans fall' in paradise lost. the 'aslant' is crucial here, a way of entering that is at odds with the architecture of the mundane egg, the knight moves, checks and slays.
mb. triangle muff, nocturner, smokey mirrors.

skullflower.title: bodhiviolence
skullflower.about:
a shard of chrome and neon into the gelded eyes of the milque-toast liberal 'elites' who like to 'Imagine there's no countries. It isn't hard to do. Nothing to kill or die for. And no religion, too'
fortunately some of us are natural born preachers, as well as dreamers, full of L.U.V., hellfire and the desire for a holy war. A desire just as basic, genetic and natural as the desire to breed, or to seek pleasure and avoid pain, but yet surely, a desire more elevated, because of its pure 'wrongness', than that of maslow's hierarchy of boring biologic needs. Possibly the desire for apocalypse, that seems so prevalent amongst those who 'feel' (as opposed to those who 'think') has been given us by Gaia so that we might hasten the depopulation that will be necessary for the planets survival.
helter skelter is coming down fast. this is the kali yuga. and you are no fucking dancer.

skullflower.title: goodbye yellow brick rainbow reich
skullflower.about:
Another mass shooting, another mint tea. another goodbye to all that, bridges burning, goodbye tigers, pangolins...killed for chinese medicine. When these beautiful creatures are gone, why bother?
Too many people, be sure to take some with you, and livestream, when you go....but like nemo small, my dkny rainoat billowing around me in slo-mo, I have so many things to do, I really must be going, my dry-cleaning to collect, un-rewound videotapes to return, my reflections endlessly caught and multiplied in the mirrored revolving doors.
skullflower.credits:
released September 2, 2019
the foargers new chrome yacht bar band. a nod to uncle frank. built on a b.o.c. fragment. hail buck dharma
Travis bean 1000a koa-boss ds1-bbe windowpane-half of king of tone klone-mxr carbon.

skullflower.title: poundland solstice compound
skullflower.about:
Priceless bloody priceless...
Sabbath bloody sabbath...
tis the season for green depopulationist fantasies, and sufi hate crimes...
the season to remind you of an inconvenient truth:
Our whole civilisation is built on cursed and haunted Indian burial grounds.
This explains why we dwell in Stephen Kings Multiverse of hideous retributions...
but, chin up my dear melting flakes of snow, for we have examples of boundless courage, dancing and fortitude to inspire us: the aphorisms of Nietzsche, Rudyard Kiplings 'If', So fight your own corner well...
for Tyson Fury and Charles Bronson who both won this year.
and my gypsy pony who's so shady
skullflower.credits:
released December 18, 2018
the travis bean through the kingoftone / mxr scipt and phase100, smoke, mirrors and mudras (gesture, pose, position=terpsichore)

skullflower.title: recursive disaster
skullflower.about:
in a self modifying loop of better immolations/in-carnations, embedded in flowers, enshrined and immaneant, language of lianas and langurous lemurs shreik and hoot over ruined terraces overlooking sulphurous violet lagoons, and in the desert haze: the cities of the red night.
what resides in the hollow statue of the god? the darkness of aegypt flows forth in knots and tendrils, scarves of light and shadow, and deeper down: those trinkets and ornaments, glamours and sidelong glances believed lost; scattered, burned, buried, and drowned, sent to their elementals: all are returned, and yet changed beyond all recognition. but you shall Know them, as Dorothy sought out the green ornaments in the Nome Kings Palace, so you shall know them, for they refract and radiate, the black light of Isis, the darkness of Set-Ghedhe. Amen

skullflower.title: satan have mercy on my long distress
skullflower.about:
Litanies of Satan
Wisest of Angels, whom your fate betrays,
And, fairest of them all, deprives of praise,
Satan have pity on my long despair!
O Prince of exiles, who have suffered wrong,
Yet, vanquished, rise from every fall more strong,
Satan have pity on my long despair!
All-knowing lord of subterranean things,
Who remedy our human sufferings,
Satan have pity on my long despair!
To lepers and lost beggars full of lice,
You teach, through love, the taste of Paradise.
Satan have pity on my long despair!
You who on Death, your old and sturdy wife,
Engendered Hope — sweet folly of this life —
Satan have pity on my long despair!
You give to the doomed man that calm, unbaffled
Gaze that rebukes the mob around the scaffold,
Satan have pity on my long despair!
You know in what closed corners of the earth
A jealous God has hidden gems of worth.
Satan have pity on my long despair!
You know the deepest arsenals, where slumber
The breeds of buried metals without number.
Satan have pity on my long despair!
You whose huge hand has hidden the abyss
From sleepwalkers that skirt the precipice,
Satan have pity on my long despair!
You who give suppleness to drunkards’ bones
When trampled down by horses on the stones,
Satan have pity on my long despair!
You who, to make his sufferings the lighter,
Taught man to mix the sulphur with the nitre,
Satan have pity on my long despair!
You fix your mask, accomplice full of guile,
On rich men’s foreheads, pitiless and vile.
Satan have pity on my long despair!
You who fill the hearts and eyes of whores
With love of trifles and the cult of sores,
Satan have pity on my long despair!
The exile’s staff, inventor’s lamp, caresser
Of hanged men, and of plotters the confessor,
Satan have pity on my long despair!
Step-father of all those who, robbed of pardon,
God drove in anger out of Eden’s garden
Satan have pity on my long despair!
Prayer
Praise to you, Satan! in the heights you lit,
And also in the deeps where now you sit,
Vanquished, in Hell, and dream in hushed defiance
O that my soul, beneath the Tree of Science
Might rest near you, while shadowing your brows,
It spreads a second Temple with its boughs.

skullflower.title: Stormfront
skullflower.about: Winter is a brutal gardener, despoiling summers finery to rot where it falls. We too, need a weeding out, a culling, a gardener. For the garden has become a strip mall. Our uncle William Burroughs wrote of a White Cat, who comes to judge, and from whom, nothing can be hidden. Our white cat is, in the words of Lowell George 'a child of electric lightning', in the midst of summers huge storm, whilst magenta lightning wiggled like a live net of electric eels, she lay on her back, squirming and powering/conducting the heavens. Sometimes I too have conducted bad weather, rode the lightning so to speak. Here is one such squall.
